code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import authReducer from'./slices/authSlice';import listingsReducer from'./slices/listingsSlice';import visitsReducer from'./slices/visitsSlice';import favoritesReducer from'./slices/favoritesSlice';export const store=configureStore({reducer:{auth:authReducer,listings:listingsReducer,visits:visitsReducer,favorites:favoritesReducer},middleware:getDefaultMiddleware=>getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:['persist/PERSIST']}})});
